column2:
"/ci1 1 How can you still be in such high spirits...?
<%me>, Matoi,
we're here to help you!"
"/ci1 2 We'll deal with the enemies here. You two should go after Shiva!"

"We did our best, but it wasn't enough...
I'm sorry we couldn't help you..."

"Patty...
Take care of them...
I'm sorry, you two..."
"That's what happens when you run in like a lunatic, you idiot!"
